committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy Development and Applications
Subcommittee on Energy Research and Production

official_title: A bill to terminate certain authority of the executive branch of the Government which is subject to congressional review unless that authority is approved by an enactment of the Congress.

summary.text: Terminates the authority of the Secretary of Energy (formerly subject to congressional veto) to issue loan guarantees and payment guarantees for alternative fuel conversion facilities, synthetic fuel conversion facilities, and municipal organic waste energy generation facilities under the Federal Nonnuclear Energy Research and Development Act of 1974, unless the exercise of such authority is approved by an enactment of Congress within 180 days after enactment of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to terminate certain authority of the executive branch of the Government which is subject to congressional review unless that authority is approved by an enactment of the Congress.
